details:
verb
- distinguish and separate out
= example: distinguish and separate out
= synonyms: sieve
- separate by passing through a sieve or other straining device to separate out coarser elements
= example: separate by passing through a sieve or other straining device to separate out coarser elements
= synonyms: strain
- check and sort carefully
= example: check and sort carefully
= synonyms: sieve
- move as if through a sieve
= example: move as if through a sieve
